milestones: 2007/08 Bundesliga: Wolfsburg vs. Hansa Rostock
Apple updates iMac line

wiki.text:
'DDR' may refer to:

In 'politics': *Disarmament, Demobilization and Reintegration, a peacebuilding
strategy for disbanding former combatants and reintegrating them into society
*Deutsche Demokratische Republik (German), the German Democratic Republic
(English), i.e., the former East Germany, a state in Europe, 1949â€“90 *Doha
Development Round

In 'science': *DDR1, a gene coding for Discoidin Domain Receptor 1 *DDR2, a gene
coding for Discoidin Domain Receptor 2

In 'technology': *Device Description Repository, a concept proposed by the
Mobile Web Initiative Device Description Working Group of the W3C *Dial-on-
demand routing, a network-connection technique *Direct to disk recording, a
recording technique that does not use magnetic tape *Double data rate, a
transfer mode for data on a computer bus *Data Direction Register, A type of
register to set a GPIO as input or output

In 'entertainment' and 'music': *[[Dance Dance Revolution]], a music video game
series by Konami *Doctor Dream Records, an independent record label

In 'sport': *Dutchland Rollers or Dutchland DerbyRollers, a women's flat-track
roller derby league based in Lancaster, Pennsylvania *Daniele De Rossi, Italian
footballer *Dwayne De Rosario, Canadian footballer

'Other'

*DDR Corp., an American real estate investment trust company. *Destroyer
Revolution, the Next Generation Escort Ship project of the Japanese Maritime Self-
Defense Force (JMSDF)
wiki.title: DDR
